title: Relates to recipient preference for donated kidneys
summary: Relates to recipient preference for donated kidneys.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2980

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 21, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ZEBROWSKI  --  read once and referred to the
         Committee on Health

       AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to recipient  prefer-
         ence for donated kidneys

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 4363 of the public health law is amended by  adding
    2  a new subdivision 5 to read as follows:
    3    5.  AN  ORGAN  PROCUREMENT  ORGANIZATION  SHALL  GIVE  PREFERENCE TO A
    4  PATIENT WHO HAS PREVIOUSLY DONATED A KIDNEY AND IS ON A WAITING LIST FOR
    5  A KIDNEY.
    6    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD00522-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to recipient preference for donated kidneys
